fields.name: Guerilla Warfare (Trigger 50%):
fields.value: All visits to you tonight silently fail and you attack them.

fields.name: Falsified Service (1x, Unlocked by placing in top 3):
fields.value: Two players of your choise recieve a mod message "proving" you're the Elite Veteran

fields.name: Panic button (Passive):
fields.value: You cant be the Assassin, but if you are the last unseen, Attack 3/5 of the remaining town at random
